briefTitle: GM-CSF Mouthwash for Preventing and Treating Mucositis in Patients Undergoing Radiation Therapy for Head and Neck Cancer
officialTitle: Management of Mucositis With GM-CSF (Sargramostim) Mouthwash Study Protocol

arms.label: Arm III: Salt & Soda Switched to GM-CSF (SG)

summary: GM-CSF may protect normal cells from the side effects, such as mucositis, of radiation therapy and may help damaged tissue heal faster after radiation therapy. This randomized clinical trial is studying how well GM-CSF works in preventing and treating mucositis in patients who are undergoing radiation therapy for head and neck cancer.

primaryOutcome.measure: Comparison of Number of Participants With Grade 1 or 2 Oral Mucositis (GM-CSF and SS Groups Only)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From baseline to onset of mucositis, approximately 16 days
